amendment.description: An amendment numbered 35 printed in Part B of House Report 118-551 to prohibit enforcement of any regulation, rule, guidance, policy, or recommendation issued pursuant to Executive Orders 13688 and 14074 that limits the sale, donation, or transfer of excess property under the 1033 Program.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prohibits enforcement of any regulation, rule, guidance, policy, or recommendation issued pursuant to Executive Orders 13688 and 14074 that limits the sale, donation, or transfer of excess property to law enforcement agencies under the 1033 Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waltz amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 187 (Roll no. 258).

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Waltz amendment (A013) Agreed to by recorded vote: 238 - 187 (Roll no. 258).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
